{{quote|[[Noro lim, noro lim, Asfaloth!]]|[[Glorfindel]] in ''[[The Fellowship of the Ring]]'', "[[Flight to the Ford]]"}}
'''Asfaloth''' was the white [[Horses|horse]] of [[Glorfindel]].

==History==
Asfaloth was ridden by Glorfindel during the search for [[Aragorn]] and the [[Travellers|Hobbits]] on their way to [[Rivendell]]. After he found them and the [[Nazgûl|Black Riders]] attacked, Glorfindel dismounted and placed [[Frodo Baggins]] (the [[Ring-bearers|Ring-bearer]]) on its back, then ordered it forward to safety at the [[Ford of Bruinen]]. Asfaloth was a remarkably fast horse, outpacing the black steeds of the Black Riders, even so that it reached the Fords first.<ref>{{FR|Flight}}, pp. 209, 211-214</ref>

==Etymology==
''Asfaloth'' is [[Sindarin]] for "Sunlit Foam", from ''[[ast]]'' ("light or heat of the sun") + ''[[faloth]]'' ("large foamy wave").<ref>{{PE|Eldarin}}, p. 18</ref>

==Other versions of the legendarium==
In answer to a question from [[Rhona Beare]] in 1958, Tolkien admitted that Glorfindel would not have used a bridle and bit when riding Asfaloth; instead he would only have used an ornamental headstall with a plume, jewels, and small bells. He assured her that he would change ''bridle and bit'' to ''headstall'' in future editions, a change that was made.<ref>{{L|211}}, p. 279</ref>

==Portrayal in adaptations==
'''1981: [[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (1981 radio series)]]:'''
:Asfaloth carries Frodo to Rivendell.<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (1981 radio series)]], "The Knife In The Dark"</ref>
[[File:The Lord of the Rings - The Fellowship of the Ring - Asfaloth.jpg|thumb|Asfaloth in ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]'']]
'''2001: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]'':'''
:Asfaloth is the horse of [[Arwen]], having taken over [[Glorfindel]]'s role. Three white Andalusians were used: Florian, the hero horse; Hero, used for high speed chases; and Odie, which was used for scenes in which Arwen was unhorsed.<ref>[http://www.ahafilm.info/movies/moviereviews.phtml?fid=7368 The Fellowship of the Ring] at [http://www.americanhumane.org/protecting-animals/programs/no-animals-were-harmed/ AHA]</ref> [[Jane Abbott]]<ref>''[[Home of the Horselords]]''</ref> and [[Sonia Duncan]]<ref>[http://www.trickrider.co.nz/index_files/Page358.htm Trickrider.co.nz]</ref> were [[Liv Tyler]]'s riding doubles.

'''2002: [[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (video game)|''The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring'' (video game)]]:'''
:Asfaloth is the horse of Glorfindel. He sends it to carry Frodo to Rivendell.

'''2006: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth II]]'':'''
:With Glorfindel added, Asfaloth is now Glorfindel's horse when mounted. Arwen's horse, also white, is not named.
